z13hjnphfvunebvy004cfh5qmlbvvp0wdlo0k.text:
What a brilliant video !
As I was looking through the video, it was almost as if I was reliving my college days..!!
College days really...are the most honest and enjoyable days of life.. for people lucky enough to get them...
The song selection was perfect. The songs were sung with emotion and the guitarist complemented the singers really well.
Seems that Sardar Patel students really treasure their moments in college to have made such a heart-touching video...
I wish I was with this batch...﻿
z13hjnphfvunebvy004cfh5qmlbvvp0wdlo0k.author: Karano Parakh
